0.1.1.name: wordpress/wp-tag-manager
0.1.1.description:
WP Tag Manager aims to seamlessly integrate into your WordPress admin. It looks and feels like the rest of the admin. Install it and see what I mean.

Features:

  • Delete tags
  • Edit tags
  • Merge tags

Planned Features:

  • Tag splitting
  • Show untagged posts
  • Show similar tags
